description: Learn how to make a tasty sweet chilli dressing to top vibrant salads, chicken dishes and everyone's favourite, potato wedges with sour cream.
keywords: Salad dressing,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Sep 2021,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sweet Chilli Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring sambal oelek, rice wine vinegar, sugar, chilli and 1/3 water to a simmer in a small saucepan over medium heat. Mix cornflour with 1 tbs water in a bowl. Add to pan and stir. Simmer for 3 minutes or until slightly thickened. Cool.
